author: Acrophis

text:
@diamondlancer 
well, fair enough; i guess. I mean even the last couple of games made in some of my favorite series were portable (FFT, KH, SMT) It's probably because the only place where the market for RPG games is big enough would be asian countries. while western countries have a smaller Console RPG market. So they pretty much made handhelds the consoles for jRPG's.

text: @radicalgarbage02 I think there is lot to like about this. It's got a celtic folk vibe, such as a traditional RPG town might have. But it goes about that and makes it rock. Hard. I'd like to hear a more filled out remix though.

author: Sephiko

text:
A retro style dungeon crawler which seems to have been nicely reviewed. I haven't played it myself but being an RPG fan I'll probably get to it at some point in my life. One thing's for sure, the music is solid.

Speaking of the PSP, I tried playing Kingdom Hearts BBS but the loading times are atrocious without using the install option in the menu screen, so I'll go buy a Memory Stick this weekend since I never had to use one until now.
